recipe.title: Oranges with Grand Marnier and Cookies
ingredients: Greek yogurt or sweetened sour cream
instructions: Peel oranges, then cut horizontally into slices. Sprinkle each sliced orange with 1 tablespoon sugar, 2 tablespoons Grand Marnier, and slivered crystallized ginger. Top with Greek yogurt or sweetened sour cream. Serve with your favorite cookies.
